parameters.doc: A my.cnf file containing defaults to connect to the DB server
parameters.name: defaults

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are ``present``, ``absent``.
properties.name: ensure

providers.doc: Use mysql as database.  Required binaries: ``/usr/bin/mysql``, ``/usr/bin/mysqladmin``.
providers.name: mysql

parameters.doc: The name of the user. This uses the 'username@hostname' form.
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc: A my.cnf file containing defaults to connect to the DB server
parameters.name: defaults

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are ``present``, ``absent``.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The password hash of the user. Use mysql_password() for creating such a hash.
properties.name: password_hash

providers.doc: Use mysql as database.  Required binaries: ``/usr/bin/mysql``, ``/usr/bin/mysqladmin``.
providers.name: mysql

parameters.doc: The primary key: either user@host for global privilges or user@host/database for database specific privileges
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc: A my.cnf file containing defaults to connect to the DB server
parameters.name: defaults

properties.doc: The privileges the user should have. The possible values are implementation dependent.
properties.name: privileges
